title: Ibn Sirin’s evidence for seeing locusts in a dream

preview.html: Seeing grasshoppers in a dream: Locusts are a type of insect that has many species, such as the Egyptian and Australian desert locusts, and the brown and red locusts. They are mentioned in the Qur’an and the Sunnah, and dreaming of locusts in a dream has attracted the attention of many interpreters. The most prominent among them is the scholar Ibn Sirin, who put various connotations for this dream, and through the article we will learn in detail about the interpretations contained in this matter. Seeing grasshoppers in a dream Seeing locusts in a dream has many connotations that can be clarified through the following lines: If a single person sees green locusts in a dream, This is good news for him about his relationship with a beautiful woman from a high-ranking family that has enormous wealth. When a person dreams of dead grasshoppers, this indicates his failure to achieve his dreams, whether on the personal, professional, or educational level. In the case of flying locusts in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer is living In a country full of dangers and has many enemies, but the matter is under control because of the soldiers who sacrifice their lives for the safety of the citizens. If one sees in his dream that he is cooking locusts, this indicates life skill and a lot of money. Seeing locusts in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that Locusts in general indicate riots and acts of violence, and if one sees grasshoppers in a dream, this indicates the chaos in which he lives and that he needs to arrange and organize his life more before escaping from his life. Observation. Seeing locusts in a dream without causing any harm symbolizes love, justice and other good things. The dreamer seeing locusts on a plate, bowl or other similar things leads to the acquisition of money accumulated in a previous era when conditions were good and livelihood was extensive. You have A dream that confuses you, wait for it.. Google, the online dream interpretation site. Seeing grasshoppers in a dream for a single woman. A girl’s dream of seeing grasshoppers indicates her relationship with a corrupt and greedy young man. If an unmarried girl sees grasshoppers in a dream, this symbolizes the companions of her daughters and indicates that they are inappropriate and want her to deviate from The right path. If a girl sees in her dream a large group of locusts falling on her, this is a sign that a crowd of people wants to harm her. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is killing locusts, this indicates the spread of gossip around her. To see a girl in her dream eating locusts This is good news of a blessing, and the abundance of sustenance and happiness within her family home, or her marriage to a good man who will do his best for her comfort. Seeing locusts in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation scholars have put forward various indications for seeing locusts in a dream for a married woman: Locusts in a married woman’s dream is a sign of offspring. It indicates that God Almighty will give birth to her a new baby, and if she has recently tied the knot and sees locusts in her dream and is not harmed, then this symbolizes her giving birth to many children. Seeing a married woman being bitten by locusts in a dream means the presence of someone who will harm her, and it is also a sign of Disorder and envy. And if a woman dreams

title: Interpretation of seeing coffee in a dream, coffee in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dreaming of the color brown in the dream of an unmarried girl and a married woman who is pregnant according to Ibn Sirin. The brown dress, the brown shoes, the color of the brown dress, the brown clothes. Seeing coffee in a dream. The brown color in a dream indicates many concepts related to the real life that the dreamer is living, and it can also symbolize psychological conditions. Or the health that the dreamer experiences in his daily life. The brown color in a dream indicates freedom, success, money, and happiness in general. Whoever sees in his dream that the place in which he lives is brown or he lives in one of the brown rooms, this is a sign. Joy and happiness in his life. Among the meanings that a dream of brown carries, we mention that it indicates a long-term relationship or marriage, and this sign appears to dreamers who are not in a relationship or to those who are in a relationship, as it is a symbol of continued marital happiness between them. If the dreamer sees during his sleep that someone gave you something brown, this is a sign that he will achieve one of the dreams that he has always dreamed of and sought, or that he will achieve one of his own ambitions, whether on a professional or social level. . Or at the family level. Brown birds in dreams show the freedom that the dreamer will gain and it will be either freedom of thought or expression or freedom from one of the many burdens and burdens that burden him. In the event that someone dreams that he is asking him, he will be able to overcome the obstacles that stand in the way of achieving ambitions. Which he is trying to achieve in his real life. Just as the color brown in a dream symbolizes fertility and procreation, it is the color of nature and dirt. Whoever sees the color brown in his dream and gets married, this is an indication that he will have many children. If the dreamer sees during his sleep that he sees himself covered in brown dust or That his pockets or clothes are full of brown dust, this is a sign of the abundance of money that he will receive in the coming period. Seeing the color brown in a dream indicates happiness, wealth, and a lot of sustenance, and it also indicates freedom. And the person who sees in a dream that he owns brown things and property, His vision indicates his progress and success in achieving his goal. If someone is deprived of his freedom, such as a prisoner or slave, if he sees a brown bird in his dream, then seeing it indicates the approach of his freedom. As for the person who sees in his dream that he is walking on a brown road, his vision indicates that he is also walking. On the right and healthy path that leads him to achieve his goals. Whoever sees in a dream that his body is full of dirt or brown dirt on his clothes, then his vision indicates the livelihood that he will receive from money in the near future. And the person who sees in a dream that his children are playing and enjoying the brown soil, then Seeing it indicates the happy news that he will receive about his children. Seeing the color brown in a dream that is worn by those you know is clear evidence of the hypocrisy of these people towards us in their dealings with us, and this color indicates hypocrisy and lack of sincerity in dealings. Coffee is the color of the earth and whoever draws it in a dream is not suitable for consumption. Which means that its meanings are not positive. On the other hand, it indicates waiting for something fruitful or fruitful to happen

title: Interpretation of a dream about immature green grapes in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of eating grapes for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, whether they are red, white, or black, picking delicious grapes, and buying grapes. Interpretation of grapes in a dream: Seeing grapes and trying to pick them is a sign of searching for food before its time, and it may not happen. Seeing sour grapes in a dream can indicate illness and anxiety. To see juice Grapes indicate money that came at an inappropriate time. It is interpreted in the desired dimension but hopefully it will be spent. Grapes, if their skin is strong in a dream, it is interpreted as earning money after hardships and exhaustion. Seeing grape seeds is interpreted as bad and not good money in the dream. The symbol of grapes To wealth, fortune and decadence, as well as stability and your ability to make others happy. Seeing or eating grapes in a dream represents wealth and prosperity. It may mean that your hard work will pay off in the end and you will be rewarded for all your effort. It can indicate immortality and sacrifices. If you dream that you are picking and picking grapes, this symbolizes To profit and the fulfillment of your desires. Black grapes in their season are sickness and fear, and perhaps they are woes to those who possess them in the number of love, and do not benefit from their black color, but rather from the evil of their essence. White grapes in their season are the juice of the world and its goodness, and in a season other than its season, one does not get it before the time when He was hoping for it. Whoever dreams that he is squeezing grapes, take the juice and leave everything, and that is for the king to come out and take the kingship of the juice by force. The same interpretation is given to sugarcane juice and other things, because the juice and its benefits are better than other juices and what is in it has not been touched by fire except what is different in its essence. And it was said. Whoever picks a bunch of grapes takes a sum from his wife, and it was said: money amounting to a thousand dirhams. It has been said that black grapes are money that does not last. If he sees them hanging from his neck, it means extreme cold and fear. He does not reject black grapes, so God Almighty says: “Sugar and a good meal.” And Zechariah found them on him. Peace be with Mary because they did not hate him and the passers-by hated him the most. It is said that he was with Noah’s son when his father called him, and he was white. When his color changed, the color of the grapes around him changed, hence the black origin of this grape. If you eat grapes in your dreams, you will suffer from many Of fears.But if you only see bunches of grapes profusely hanging between the leaves, you will soon reach prominent positions and be able to make others happy.For a girl, this dream has a bright promise. He will fulfill her most ardent desires. If you dream that you are riding a horse and wandering through the bushes of musky grapes while picking and eating some of its fruits, this means comfortable work and the fulfillment of great desires. If a question arises in your mind about the toxic quality of the fruit you are eating, then you will have doubts and fears about success, but they will stop. Gradually stop disturbing you. Grapes are an indication of a woman because she is like a garden because she drinks it and bears it and it has a delicious taste, especially since it is the sugar that informs the body. It is an indication of marriage because it is like semen, and it is like anesthesia of sexual intercourse, including the juice. It indicates a generous man who is a good horse. Because of the many benefits of grapes, such as being like a sultan, a scholar, and a horse of wealth. Whoever has grapes, as mentioned

title: Interpretation of seeing cooked carrots in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cooked carrots in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, carrots are useful fruits that can be eaten in many ways and give a strong and delicious taste when added to food. In different situations, in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing cooked carrots in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of the dream of seeing cooked carrots in a dream. Jurists say in interpreting the dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating carrots with other food and that the carrots are cooked, this indicates Increased nutrition, kindness and money, or indicates many changes. In this person's life there is a cure for pain and illness. In his dream he eats cooked, fresh and clean carrots, this indicates that he is very good for the person and the situation. If the carrots are peeled and unclean, this indicates that this person will quarrel with his family. It also indicates the presence of bad words in this person’s speech. Interpretation of a dream about seeing carrots in a dream for someone. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing raw carrots in a dream is an unpleasant vision, such as if a person sees in his dream that he is eating raw carrots, this indicates that he will be exposed to many misfortunes. In his life, but if he sees that he is holding a handful of carrots in his hands, this indicates that he will face a series of crises and financial difficulties, but they will resolve after a while. But if one sees in a dream that he is holding a carrot in his hands, this means that he is trying to achieve many things, But this is difficult for him, but if this person is corrupt, it means that he will suffer a lot. . Because of his bad behavior. If the color of carrots is green, this indicates abandonment, quarrels, and quarrels in a person’s life. If the color of carrots is yellow, this indicates a serious illness. It is good and indicates the approach of marrying a person if the person is single. Interpretation of the dream of seeing carrot juice in a dream. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says: Seeing carrot juice in a dream is one of the good visions that bring goodness to its owner. Just as a woman sees that she is drinking a cup of carrots, this indicates the approach of a camel. He or his wife will become pregnant and give birth to a male child. Interpretation of a dream about cutting carrots in a dream: Ibn Sirin says: If a person dreams that he is cutting a carrot with a knife, then he is cutting off his offspring or his livelihood. She is trying to separate him from his family, but if an unmarried girl dreams that she is cutting carrots, this indicates the breakup of her engagement or the end of her relationship with one of the people she loves. But if a person dreams in a dream that he is eating carrots without holding them, this indicates that the person will suffer from a condition. Many sorrows and misfortunes. Someone else, so she has to adopt it. Interpretation of a dream about seeing carrots in a dream for a married woman. Dream interpretation scholars say: If a woman sees that she is cooking carrots, this means that she will get a lot of money, and if she works, this indicates that she will achieve more victories in her life, but if She saw that. If she eats cooked carrots, this indicates that she will give birth to a new pregnancy and that the baby will be a boy. However, if she sees that she is eating uncooked carrots during marriage, this indicates that her husband will be exposed to her. In a major financial crisis. But if a woman sees in her dream that she is eating carrots and...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beard being cut off in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream when seeing a trimmed beard in a dream, and trimming the beard indicates loss of money and losses in trade, as it indicates a lack of debt. Interpretation of dreams: cutting the beard in a dream: The beard is considered one of the most important things for men because it gives them a beautiful shape, and many of them prefer to grow their beard long and not cut it because it looks good, while there are those who prefer not to have it until they become younger than the beard, which gives them a little aging, but dream interpretation scholars have confirmed that Cutting a beard in a dream has many different interpretations, including what concerns women and men in all circumstances. Therefore, through our website My Look, we will show you the details of the interpretation of seeing a trimmed beard, as many want to know whether this dream is bad or good, in order to reassure their hearts, and we will explain that in this article. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a beard being cut off in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of cutting a beard. Ibn Sirin: A person who sees that his beard is very long will be a sign of depression and some sadness. If the beard appears in a dream to become long with the ground, this is a sign of death. If the beard reaches the abdomen, you will get tired until you get money. When you see a long beard of Only the sides, this is a sign of saving money that another person will enjoy. Whoever thinks that his beard is cut off is evidence of bankruptcy and loss of money. Anyone over forty who sees his beard cut off in pajamas will be good news and wealth for him. Read also: Interpretation of dreams to see a cut mustache in Interpretation of a dream about cutting a beard for a single woman: Trimming the beard in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that her engagement is approaching. Cutting the beard in a dream for a girl indicates kindness and a new life. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a beard for a married woman: When a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is shaving his beard, this will be A departure from the neglect and anxiety of our parents. Evidence of the loss of fatigue and exhaustion that she and her husband are experiencing. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about rubbing hair and eyebrows in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a beard for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that her husband is shaving his beard, this indicates the birth of a male child. Evidence that childbirth will be easy and there is nothing difficult and stressful. Interpretation of shaving the beard in a dream If a bearded man sees himself shaving his beard in a dream, this indicates his shortcomings in worship. The vision may indicate only an external commitment, but there is no sincerity in the intention. Shaving the beard In a dream for a man: Seeing yourself shaving your beard in a dream indicates a lack of debt to the pioneer or to the one who shaved his beard. Seeing a beard also indicates the presence of a problem and troubles. Seeing a beard being cut indicates positive changes in the fortuneteller’s life. Seeing in a dream shaving a dead person’s beard. Seeing himself shaving his beard The dead may indicate many benefits to the dreamer, such as inheritance and the like. Seeing that the deceased’s beard is being shaved may indicate the dreamer’s wrong actions and that he must reform his life and be upright. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a man’s beard for a single woman. If he sees that he is cutting and shortening his beard, this indicates her connection to a young man with good intentions and religious. If he sees that he FlybeardA specific person will be indicated

If he sees that he is cutting and trimming his beard, this indicates that she is associated with a young man of good faith and religious. If he sees that he is shaving the beard of a specific person, it will be indicated

An unmarried girl who sees a lion in her dream and suffers in reality from her feeling of sadness and distress from the distress and turmoil she faces, this is one of the most praiseworthy visions because God Almighty will help her and wants her. title: Interpretation of seeing a duck in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a duck in a dream by Ibn Sirin, specifically ducks are considered one of the wild birds found on the face of the planet, in addition to Bedouin creatures that are divided into sea birds and land birds, so the interpretation of seeing a duck appears in a dream very often, and it should be noted that ducks come in different colors. There are many and different types, as God created them in this form and was creative in creating them, so the interpretation that scholars have used to deal with the interpretations related to the dream of a duck in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a duck in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In fact, the interpretation of seeing a duck in a dream is one of the many dreams that people see during Their sleep, therefore, indicates many interpretations that relate to the sign of goodness that will come in the life of the dreamer: It is worth noting that the duck in the dream indicates the upcoming source of livelihood in the dreamer’s life. Thus, seeing ducks swimming in the water indicates happiness, calm, and stability in life. But if the sound of ducks is heard in the dream and they run on the ground, this is a sign of a problem or disaster that the dreamer will face. Thus, ducks in a man’s dream show loyalty between him and his wife. However, if a woman married to a duck sees the color black, this is evidence of fears and sorrows. Which you are going through in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of seeing frozen fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing white ducks in a dream. White ducks are also considered one of the types of ducks widespread in nature, in addition to their large presence, which in some interpretations indicates joy and happiness, so the interpretation came. Seeing a duck in a dream is as follows: Therefore, seeing ducks in a dream is a sign of sustenance and abundance in the dreamer’s livelihood. Likewise, a white duck in a man or young man’s dream indicates a woman. It also indicates his family’s obedience to him and their respect for him, and that he is one of the elders of the family. But if a man catches a white duck, this is a sign that he is on the wrong path and that he is following one of the taboos. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing milk coming out of the breast in a dream. Interpretation of seeing little ducks in a dream. Thus, seeing a duck in a dream is one of the recurring dreams that people see. In their dreams, so the search for the interpretation of seeing a duck in a dream continues, with knowledge of the consequences of seeing a duck in a dream: In addition, seeing small ducks in a dream indicates the life of the dreamer. Therefore, seeing small ducks in a man’s dream indicates a woman in A man’s life. If small ducks are seen in a married woman’s dream, it is a sign of good news that she will be pregnant by a male, God willing. On the other hand, seeing ducks in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will achieve what she wants. See also: Dream interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream for a single woman And a married woman in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about feeding ducks in a dream. In fact, feeding living creatures is a beautiful work for which a Muslim receives a reward from God Almighty, so the search for an interpretation of seeing a duck in a dream comes in addition to the interpretive meaning

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a cactus in a dream by leading scholars and dream interpreters?

preview.html: Important interpretations of leading scholars for seeing a cactus in a dream while sleeping. Cactus is a plant covered with thorns, and it is used to treat many hair and skin diseases. So what is the meaning of seeing a cactus in a dream? Are they all negative connotations or are they divided between negative and positive? All these questions with an Egyptian website you will find the perfect answers, read them below with us and learn about the interpretation of their dream in the smallest details. Cactus in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a cactus means patience and the previous main sign is divided into sub-connotations. The first sign: This dream means a message that the dreamer will endure severe suffering and suffer from it, and it is confirmed Jurists believe that this suffering will be different from one person to another. His wealth is to protect his family from a scandal or annoyance, which is summed up in a big problem with a powerful person because of which the dreamer will be exposed to injustice and a feeling of helplessness. The second sign is related to the dreamer’s dream that he is in the desert and finds a cactus plant, and this means that he is complaining of confusion and urgency towards something and he also needs to be patient until God honors. She answered and said that the relationship was good, but she discovered that her husband was suffering from some problems that prevent him from having children at the present time, so the translator’s answer was that she should be patient and not rush to make the decision to remain pregnant. Word comes to the skin from the Merciful that her husband has healed and is ready to have children. Seeing a cactus in a dream for a married woman means that her husband’s money is abundant and his wealth in this world will be enormous, and this interpretation will be correct if she sees that more than one cactus has been planted in her dream. Cactus, i.e. they The number was great and the house was full. If a married woman took a cactus plant from someone in her dream, this vision is specific to her steadfastness in religion and her strong attachment to it. Thanks and God’s blessing. If a married woman sees herself offering her husband an aloe vera plant to eat, this means that she will not allow her husband to face difficult circumstances alone, but rather will stand by him and work with him throughout his life without getting bored because she finds her happiness in that. He – She. If an unmarried woman eats this plant in her dream, the interpretation of the dream indicates that she is one of those with a tender heart known for her kindness and mercy to others, following the example of the morals and mercy of our Prophet, the Messenger. . What is famous for it is that God Almighty said about it: It was said to the virgin girl: If she bumped into a cactus plant in her dream, then this vision reveals her actions and her lack of judgment because she is disobedient and burdened with sins, and she must know what she is doing. It will make it to the fire in the end. When the dreamer cuts an aloe vera plant in his dream, this indicates that his hope will be disappointed and that the ambition he wanted to pursue will slip out of his hand and he had no role in it. If the dreamer dreams of taking a medicine derived from the aloe vera plant, this is an omen It is good that the dreamer's pain and physical pain will disappear soon. When the dreamer dreams that he opened the door of his house and found an aloe vera plant placed in front of the door, this vision indicates a great administrative position that the dreamer takes and is happy with. When the dreamer sees that he made a skin mask, and one of its most important ingredients was aloe vera, This is it

title: Seeing a dead mother hugging and crying in a dream, and what does it indicate?

preview.html: Seeing a dead mother hugging and crying in a dream Seeing a dead mother in a dream is considered one of the strongest visions that indicate the condition of the dreamer or dreamer. From troubles and troubles, judgments end, and it may indicate hearing good news. Interpretation of seeing a dead mother crying in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a dead mother crying and hugging God indicates the death of worry, sadness, and getting rid of troubles. Seeing a dead mother crying may indicate that the fortuneteller is sick. Or he is going through a difficult time, but she will pass this stage and recover from her illness. Also, seeing a dead mother crying indicates good news. Interpretation of seeing a dead mother crying in a dream for a man: Seeing a dead mother crying indicates debts or financial distress, and these debts will be paid and his financial condition will improve. And if An unmarried young man sees that he is hugging his deceased mother while she is crying, this may indicate that he is going through a psychological or financial crisis or problems at work. Interpretation of seeing a dead mother alive in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a dead mother in a married dream, hugging her and crying, indicates Good news and the fulfillment of a long-awaited desire. If the woman is newly married, this indicates that she is pregnant. This vision also indicates the end of the worries and problems that were disturbing her and exhausting her psychologically. The vision also indicates that she will be freed from financial crises and the abundance of money and goodness in her life. The mother’s vision A dead woman in a dream is sick in a divorced or widowed woman’s dream. Seeing a dead mother in a divorced or widowed woman’s dream is a good vision that indicates good luck and good news. It also indicates the death of worry and worry and positive changes in the dreamer’s life. As for the case of seeing a dead mother sick, this is due to The viewer is suffering from life responsibilities or a problem in her life. Seeing a dead mother hugging and crying indicates the collapse of worries, getting rid of problems, and overcoming obstacles. Seeing a dead mother in a sick dream for unmarried women. Seeing the illness of a deceased mother does not necessarily mean the illness of the deceased, but it shows the girl’s suffering and the seriousness of worries and conflicts. That brings her to life. It may indicate failure in her life and difficulty in obtaining an academic degree, and it may indicate that she is suffering from a stressful emotional relationship or an attachment that is collapsing as a result of a lack of understanding. Seeing a dead mother’s illness may indicate the girl’s misbehavior and committing sins. Seeing a dead mother dying In a dream, seeing your mother die again is a vision that has many connotations and may indicate the death of another person in the family. The vision may indicate family problems, severance of family ties, division, and strife. The vision may indicate the marriage of an unmarried young man or unmarried girl. Seeing the nakedness of a dead mother in a dream. A dream: This vision may indicate debts that must be paid or a vow that must be fulfilled. Seeing a dead mother in pain. Seeing a dead mother in pain indicates the problems and fears that the dreamer is suffering from and the difficult stage that he is going through. This vision shows the dreamer’s many sins and he must repent and return to God.

title: Interpretation of a pen in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the pen in a dream has many interpretations, as it is one of the most important tools that everyone relies on in writing, and it is a symbol of science and culture, and its meaning, especially since it can take many forms. It is worth noting that the pen is the first of God’s creations and is called the “pen of power.” It is the pen designated for writing people’s destinies from the light that reaches a length between the sky and the earth. What is the interpretation of seeing a pen in a dream in detail? This is what we will learn through today’s article about the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of the pen in a dream The pen is considered one of the most important tools that a person resorts to, whether he is a writer, scientist, researcher, student, or even a young student in writing, as it is one of the means without which a person cannot continue . He recorded his thoughts and ideas, whether scientific or social. It is the means through which we can translate the thoughts and ideas running through the mind into letters and words. But what about seeing it in a dream and what does it mean in detail? Imam Al-Sadiq states in his interpretation of a dream about a pen that it is a sign of a sound mind and sound opinion, as well as the dreamer’s great status in reality. He added that if the writing written on the pen is beautiful and elegant, then this vision is a sign of the creativity of its owner and his ability to reach a high position in the future, God willing. In this regard, Al-Nabulsi mentioned that seeing a pen in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates the abundance of knowledge that the dreamer possesses, Which makes him enjoy a high status. In some cases, a pen in a dream indicates a person of status and power, who often has most of the decisions in his hands. Perhaps owning a pen in a dream is evidence of achieving excellence and creativity compared to his peers and superiority in work over them. As for the presence of many pens in a dream, it is interpreted as an indication that it is a set of actions that the dreamer will take in reality, which will be crowned with success. As for a gold or silver pen in a dream, it is one of the dreams that bodes well for its owner, as it portends him the acquisition of knowledge. Benefits or achieving great success in the future. Interpretation of the gift of a pen in a dream: If the dreamer finds that he is receiving a pen as a gift from someone in a dream, then this dream is a symbol of dignity and pride, as well as the self-respect that the individual possesses in reality. Interpretation of a black pen in a dream, although Seeing a pen in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates goodness and heralds success and distinction for its owner. A black pen in a dream is not a vision worthy of praise. This is because it indicates the accumulation of successive sorrows and disappointments that the dreamer will be exposed to, God forbid. Interpretation of a red pen in a dream: Seeing a red pen in a dream is generally considered one of the warning visions that draws the dreamer’s attention to the need to be careful and not to enter into something close to reality, and it may bring Warning signs from a person in his life who has a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a blue pen. Seeing a dry blue pen is one of the good visions that warns its owner of the abundant good that he will achieve in this world.
